Value: a RA human-gut microbiome interaction that shows an decrease of Bacteroides fragilis in patients with RA compared with healthy controls. Bacteroides fragilis is a rare cause of septic arthritis.

Subject: expansion of unclassified Proteobacteria in diarrheal patient gut
Value: a diarrheal patient-gut microbiome interaction that shows an increase of unclassified Proteobacteria in patients in the gut of human diarrheal patient compared with healthy controls.

Subject: has microbe depleted in diseased host
Value: an object property that represents the relation between a host-microbiome interaction and a microbe where the population of the microbe is depleted in a diseased host compared to a healthy host control.

Subject: expansion of Proteus mirabilis in RA human urine
Value: a RA human-urine microbiome interaction that shows an expansion of Proteus mirabilis in patients with RA compared with healthy controls.

Subject: depletion of Blautia coccoides in RA human gut compared to fibromyalgia patients
Value: a RA human-gut microbiome interaction that shows an decrease of Blautia coccoides in patients with RA compared with fibromyalgia patients.

Subject: depletion of Bacteroides in RA human gut compared to fibromyalgia patients
Value: a RA human-gut microbiome interaction that shows an decrease of Bacteroides in patients with RA compared with fibromyalgia patients.

Subject: has microbe expanded in diseased host
Value: an object property that represents the relation between a host-microbiome interaction and a microbe where the population of the microbe is expanded in a diseased host compared to a healthy host control.

Subject: depletion of Bacteroides fragilis in RA human gut compared to fibromyalgia patients
Value: a RA human-gut microbiome interaction that shows an decrease of Bacteroides fragilis in patients with RA compared with fibromyalgia patients.

Subject: depletion of Bifidobacterium bifidum in RA human gut compared to fibromyalgia patients
Value: a RA human-gut microbiome interaction that shows an decrease of Bifidobacterium bifidum in patients with RA compared with fibromyalgia patients.

Subject: depletion of Haemophilus spp. in RA human gut
Value: a RA human gut microbiome interaction that shows an decrease of Haemophilus sp  in patients with RA compared with healthy controls.

Subject: expansion of Bacteroides sp. in RA human gut
Value: a RA human-gut microbiome interaction that shows an expansion of Bacteroides sp in patients with RA compared with healthy controls.

Subject: alpha diversity
Value: the mean species diversity in sites or habitats at a local scale

Subject: beta diversity
Value: the ratio between regional and local species diversity
